Energy.whyItHelps: Systematically tries energy interventions to find evidence-based methods that genuinely work.

Energy.name: Verify Energy Claims
Energy.label: fact checks
Energy.whyItHelps: Researches scientific backing for energy advice before investing time in unproven methods.

Sleep.name: Track Sleep Quality
Sleep.label: metrics
Sleep.whyItHelps: Measures actual sleep quality and duration to validate which sleep strategies produce real improvements.

Sleep.name: Test Sleep Methods
Sleep.label: trials
Sleep.whyItHelps: Experiments with sleep recommendations to find evidence-based techniques that actually work.

Sleep.name: Question Sleep Advice
Sleep.label: research
Sleep.whyItHelps: Investigates scientific support for sleep recommendations before adopting new sleep practices.

Discipline.name: Measure Discipline Wins
Discipline.label: completions
Discipline.whyItHelps: Creates concrete evidence of discipline success to build confidence in personal capability.

Discipline.name: Test Habit Science
Discipline.label: experiments
Discipline.whyItHelps: Validates habit formation advice through personal experimentation with scientifically-backed methods.

Discipline.name: Analyze What Fails
Discipline.label: analyses
Discipline.whyItHelps: Studies personal discipline failures objectively to identify patterns and improve future success.

Gratitude.name: Test Gratitude Effects
Gratitude.label: mood ratings

Gratitude.name: Document Gratitude Data
Gratitude.label: entries
Gratitude.whyItHelps: Creates evidence-based record of gratitude benefits rather than assuming positive effects.

Gratitude.name: Research Gratitude Science
Gratitude.label: studies
Gratitude.whyItHelps: Investigates scientific evidence supporting gratitude practices before fully committing to them.

Relationships.name: Track Relationship Quality
Relationships.label: assessments

Relationships.label: experiments
Relationships.whyItHelps: Tries different communication strategies to find evidence-based approaches that actually improve relationships.

Relationships.name: Verify Relationship Advice
Relationships.label: fact checks
Relationships.whyItHelps: Investigates relationship advice against psychological research before applying it in personal life.

Spirituality.name: Track Spiritual Effects

Spirituality.name: Question Spiritual Claims
Spirituality.label: evaluations

Productivity.name: Track Productivity Metrics

Confidence.label: evidences

Confidence.label: experiments
